subject: ATTENTION: Rebecca ARE YOU DEAD OR ALIVE???
body:
FROM THE DESK OF  MARK SMITH
DEBT MANAGEMENT OFFICE
Our Ref: UN/CPO/WB/845/2022


*ATTENTION: *Rebecca

*YOUR CONTRACT INHERITANCE FUND  DIVERTING 38 MILLION BRITISH POUNDS
STERLING*

In the course of our General Auditing and Account revision of this first
quarter of the year 2024, we discovered that the Bank Accounts belonging to
some Benefactors have been changed on the basis that the owners were no
longer alive some time last year or have given out an authorization note of
change of data.

After the investigations however, it was revealed that there are Foreigners
who are collaborating with Retired Staffs to make these changes illegally
without the knowledge of the Bonafide Benefactors and one traced to your
own change is  Mr George Barnett  who said you are no more alive , so as to
divert your  Funds to the below account.

They have also forwarded this bank account below as the new account that
will receive this money.



*Bank: Hang Seng BankBank Address: 83 Des Veoux Road, Central - Hong
KongAccount Name: *


*JOHN DAVISAccount Number: 235-325172-882Bank Code: 024Swift Code: HASEHKHH*

But we wanted to confirm if actually this is true and hence decided to
write to your email address which after 2 days from now and there is no
response, we will then know that you are dead indeed and go on with the
transfer. If proved otherwise by you that you did not die, please forward
to us all the related Benefactors particulars including your Telephone
number, contact address. Copy of your ID these details from you will help
to assist us reach a conclusion that you are STILL ALIVE

Anything contrary to this claim will help us charge this man to court and
prosecute him while your fund will be paid to you immediately without any
further delay. You have to get back to us on time for us to commence legal
proceedings against th*ese* Mr George Barnett Associates and their
accomplices.

Note: to help us fish these people out anywhere they are, this message
should not be forwarded to them or anybody, and also stop whatever you are
doing with them it is for your own good. Be very careful whatever you are
doing  with these crooks. For your own good Stop sending money to this
crooks I promise you this commission most assist you to make sure your
funds gets to you in good condition without delay only if you can comply
with our advice  please you are advice to state all the amount you sent to
this crooks called

Yours in Service,
{CODE 001}
Mark Smith (Head Auditor
Rhounda Murray (secretary)

subject: Re: ATTENTION: Rebecca ARE YOU DEAD OR ALIVE???
body:
Hello Mark Smith and Rhounda Murray,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, this is quite a surprise! I had no idea that someone was trying to claim my funds under the pretense of my demise. That's quite a story, isn't it? 

I'm curious about how you discovered this situation. Could you please share more details about your auditing process? Also, who is this Mr. George Barnett? How did he come into the picture?

As for the information you requested, I'm afraid I can't provide personal details over email due to security reasons. However, I assure you that I am very much alive and interested in resolving this matter.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Rebecca

{CODE 001}
MARK SMITH (Head Auditor

subject: Re: ATTENTION: Rebecca Carefully fill in the required information and return back
body:
Hello Mark Smith,

Thank you for reaching out and providing such detailed information. I must say, it's quite a lot to take in! 

I'm curious about this Strauss person and their group. It sounds like they've been causing quite a bit of trouble. Could you tell me more about them? What exactly have they done?

Also, I'm not sure I understand the situation with the World Bank and Santander Bank. Are they working together on this? How does that work?

Lastly, you mentioned something about a form attached to your email, but I didn't see any attachments. Could you please resend it?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Rebecca

subject: Re: ATTENTION: Rebecca Carefully fill in the required information and return back
body:
Hello Mark Smith,

Lastly, you mentioned that I need to fill out a form and return it back to an address. However, I didn't see any form or address attached to your email. Could you please resend it?

subject: Re: ATTENTION: Rebecca Carefully fill in the required information and return back
body:
Hello Mark Smith,

Thank you for your detailed message. I'm doing well, thank you for asking. It's quite a surprise to hear about Strauss and his group. I had no idea such things were happening behind the scenes.

I appreciate your efforts in protecting my interests and ensuring that my funds are safe from these impostors. It's reassuring to know that there are people like you who are working hard to prevent such fraudulent activities.

It's exciting to think about the possibilities that this payment project could bring into my life. Establishing a multi-million dollar company sounds like a dream come true!

I'm glad to hear that World Bank and Santander Bank are involved in securing my payment. That definitely adds an extra layer of trust and security.

However, I must apologize as I am not comfortable sharing personal information such as banking details or copies of ID over email due to privacy concerns. Is there any other way we can proceed with this without me having to share sensitive information?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Rebecca

body:

subject: Re: ATTENTION: Rebecca WAITING FOR YOUR URGENT RESPONDS
body:
Good morning Mark Smith,

I hope this message finds you well. I appreciate your concern about my funds and the assurance that they are safe. It's comforting to know that there are still good people out there who are willing to help others.

The idea of an ATM DEBIT CARD sounds convenient indeed, especially with the ability to withdraw money from any part of the world. However, I'm a bit confused about the covering that needs to be issued in my name by the court. Could you please elaborate on what this covering is and why it's necessary?

Also, you mentioned needing some information from me. While I understand your need for details to proceed, I must admit that I'm a bit hesitant about sharing personal information over email due to security reasons. Is there another secure way we could handle this?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Rebecca

body:
Good morning Mark Smith,

I hope this message finds you well. I appreciate your prompt response and the detailed explanation about the process. It's quite interesting to learn about these procedures.

Just to clarify, you mentioned something about a court order and a sworn affidavit of claim ownership. Could you please elaborate more on how I can obtain these? Is there a specific court I need to approach or any particular documents I need to prepare?

Also, you mentioned an ATM card that will be delivered to my address. Can you tell me more about this? How will it work and what are the security measures in place for such transactions?

Lastly, you mentioned that all eyes will raise again upon my payment project if I leave my payment here so long. Could you please explain what this means? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Rebecca
